ISSUE.TITLE: Decimals validation error
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: develop Steps to reproduce the problem: **1.** Install a new instance of nopCommerce with Vietnamese language. ![image](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/assets/52314713/fad31c66-b9fe-493c-ae9b-e6b9026778d0) **3.** Go to any page that has a decimal input field, such as a product page (please select Vietnam language from the select box). **4.** If the decimal input field already has a value, please click inside the field and then click outside of it. If not, please enter a decimal value into the field and then click outside of it. Please note that you must enter a decimal number, for example, 10.0 or 10.00. ![image](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/assets/52314713/53f9139f-0313-44c2-a0a8-5e6d40f80962)
